item.description:
The next installment of our Mobile Software Developer's meetup will be at TechStars Boston!

BEER and light snacks will be served! As usual, the format will be open discussion, but here is a rough agenda for the event:

1. Developing AccelGolf on 3 platforms
2. iPhone, BlackBerry & Android tips & tricks
3. Flash across Devices (Scott Janousek)
4. App Creation Frameworks


For any app developers who are interested in analytics, swing by between 5-6 pm and Localytics will instrument your app for you (bring your laptop). Or feel free to swing by early to hang out and chat with some of the TechStars companies.
item.how_to_find_us: Across from the Tavern in Central Square. Look for the building with the Kaplan sign on it and head up to the 3rd floor.
item.name: Mobile Developers' Meetup 5
